thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Jamison Capital to Close Commodities Hedge Fund

author: Alison Sider
title: Jamison Capital to Close Commodities Hedge Fund

organizations.name: jamison capital to close commodities hedge fund jamison capital partners lp

text:
Jamison Capital Partners LP is shutting its $1.5 billion flagship fund, one of the biggest high-profile commodities hedge funds to close in recent months.
The New York-based fund run by former Morgan Stanley trader Stephen Jamison focused on commodities and macroeconomic trends. It soon will begin returning capital to investors and is converting to a family office structure, according to a person familiar with the matter.
Family...
